effect.shortEffect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.
effect.full: This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect. This ability does not stack with a held item. Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.

description.diamond-pearl: The stench helps keep wild Pokémon away.
description.platinum: The stench helps keep wild Pokémon away.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: The stench helps keep wild Pokémon away.
description.black-white: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
description.black-2-white-2: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
description.x-y: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
description.sun-moon: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
description.sword-shield: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
